error.warnings: You should tick all points before using Robonomics Integration
error.has_no_subscription: Subscription owner address has no subscription
error.is_not_in_devices: Controller address is not in subscription devices

data.warn_data_sending: Integration will store your encrypted data in IPFS local node and save the CID in Robonomics blockchain.
data.warn_account_managment: Integration will be able to create or delete Home Assistant users based on the list of your Robonomics subscription devices.

user.description: To use Robonomics Integration you shoul know the following:

data.sending_timeout: Timeout for sending data to Robonomics (min)
data.user_ipfs_gateway_port: Port for the custom IPFS gateway (optional)

conf.description: Add your Robonomics accounts seed phrases. You can also add credentials for your Pinata account or custom IPFS gateway, without it data files will be pinned to IPFS only from your local node.

data.sending_timeout: Timeout for sending data to Robonomics (min)
data.user_ipfs_gateway_port: Port for the custom IPFS gateway (optional)

init.description: Configure sending timeout and Pinata credentials.
